name: Staying Alive (codeforjoy)
description:
Staying Alive is a rhythm game in which you have to keep your inner dancer alive by evoiding to click off the required beat.

  • Click to play  

Tools used to make this game:
Unity + C#, Cubase, Blender, Mixamo, Photoshop

  •  Sebastian Hehemann: Blender modeling
  • Caroline Hehemann: Everything else
